 1: <?php
 2:         
 3:     namespace PowerCMS\Helper;
 4: 
 5:     use PowerCMS\Vendor\Template;
 6:     use PowerCMS\Exception\PowerExceptionTemplate;
 7:     
 8:     class PowerHelperTemplate extends Template { 
 9:         
10:         public function __construct($filename, $accurate = false){
11:             if(empty($filename) || !file_exists($filename)) { 
12:                 throw new PowerExceptionTemplate("File template invalid");
13:             }
14:             parent::__construct($filename, $accurate);
15:         }
16:         
17:         public function addFile($varname, $filename){
18:             if(!parent::exists($varname)) { 
19:                 throw new PowerExceptionTemplate("addFile: var $varname does not exist");
20:             }
21:             parent::addFile($varname, $filename);
22:         }
23:         
24:     }
